snippet.title: Stellona Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Stellona is available now on Steam and Itch.io for $4.99! 

Part 3D platformer and part slice of life game, Stellona is a western adventure with a large emphasis on exploration and discovery where you move to a small town to work at a struggling museum.

You're also a rabbit-person. Everyone is rabbit-people. 

Stellona on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1622360/Stellona/

Stellona on Itch: https://kcamberart.itch.io/stellona
